mapper.select:
SELECT sender_isself,sender_code,sender,sender_phone,sender_isself,accepter,car_type,car_info_connect.receive_id,brand,`owner`,color,plate_number ,engine_number,frame_number,picture FROM `jxy_data_db`.`car_info_connect` JOIN car_info_basic ON car_info_connect.receive_id = car_info_basic.receive_id
car_info_connect.company_code = #{companyCode}
AND sender like CONCAT ('%','${sender}','%')
AND car_info_connect.acc_time >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND car_info_connect.acc_time <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')

SELECT taker_isself,taker,taker_code,taker_phone,taker_isself,sender,sender_phone,accepter,car_info_connect.receive_id,car_type ,brand,`owner`,color,plate_number ,engine_number,frame_number,picture FROM `jxy_data_db`.`car_info_connect` JOIN car_info_basic ON car_info_connect.receive_id = car_info_basic.receive_id where car_info_basic.company_code = #{companyCode}
sender like CONCAT ('%','#{sender}','%')
AND car_info_connect.take_time >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND car_info_connect.take_time <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')

SELECT progect_id,ser_cause,ser_project,sender,sender_phone,accepter,car_info_connect.receive_id,car_type ,brand,`owner`,color,plate_number ,engine_number,frame_number,picture FROM car_bussines_service JOIN car_info_connect ON car_bussines_service.receive_id = car_info_connect.receive_id JOIN car_info_basic ON car_bussines_service.receive_id = car_info_basic.receive_id
car_bussines_service.receive_id=#{receiveId}
sender like CONCAT ('%','#{sender}','%')
AND car_bussines_service.create_time >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND car_bussines_service.create_time <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')

SELECT car_bussines_parts.receive_id,progect_id,parts_name,specification,notes,number,sender,sender_phone,accepter,car_info_connect.receive_id,car_type ,brand,`owner`,color,plate_number ,engine_number,frame_number,picture FROM car_bussines_parts JOIN car_info_connect ON car_bussines_parts.receive_id=car_info_connect.receive_id JOIN car_info_basic ON car_bussines_parts.receive_id = car_info_basic.receive_id
car_bussines_parts.receive_id=#{receiveId}
sender like CONCAT ('%','#{sender}','%')
AND car_bussines_parts.create_time >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND car_bussines_parts.create_time <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')

SELECT car_bussines_beautify.receive_id,progect_id,pro_beautify,notes,sender,sender_phone,accepter,car_info_connect.receive_id,car_type ,brand,`owner`,color,plate_number ,engine_number,frame_number,picture FROM car_bussines_beautify JOIN car_info_connect ON car_bussines_beautify.receive_id=car_info_connect.receive_id JOIN car_info_basic ON car_bussines_beautify.receive_id = car_info_basic.receive_id
car_bussines_beautify.receive_id=#{receiveId}
sender like CONCAT ('%','#{sender}','%')
AND car_bussines_beautify.create_time >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND car_bussines_beautify.create_time <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')

SELECT car_bussines_park.receive_id,park_id,notes,sender,sender_phone,accepter,car_info_connect.receive_id,car_type ,brand,`owner`,color,plate_number ,engine_number,frame_number,picture FROM car_bussines_park JOIN car_info_connect ON car_bussines_park.receive_id=car_info_connect.receive_id JOIN car_info_basic ON car_bussines_park.receive_id = car_info_basic.receive_id
car_bussines_park.receive_id=#{receiveId}
sender like CONCAT ('%','#{sender}','%')
AND car_bussines_park.create_time >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND car_bussines_park.create_time <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
SELECT car_basic_id,`receive_id`, `owner`, `car_type`, `brand`, `color`, `plate_number`, `engine_number`, `frame_number`,picture FROM car_info_basic WHERE receive_id = #{receiveId};
